data.persona: I was invited for an evening meal. I will eat that, and then I will go home. That's what a dinner guest is!
data.description:
You are in the Cottage.
The small cottage was white with two, shuttered windows. It was in the unique shape of a circle and was built of plaster. Smoke billowed from the chimney.
There's a dinner table, a chimney, and a shuttered window here.
A cook is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing some muddy shoes and a jacket.
data.goal: put muddy shoes on dinner table
